content: Retirement AMA 1M65 CPF Asked by Kenichi XiAsked on 07 Nov 2018At age 60 i compounded my OA+SA to $1mil and decided to withdraw $1k. Does CPF take out from OA or SA first? Thank you.?At age 55, i fufill FRS and have excess and Never withdraw the excess to roll my money in CPF.At age 60, i decided to start withdraw $1k per mth, which account does CPF withdraw from first?OA or SA?Thank you.1 answerAnswerBump1
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Loo Cheng Chuan, Founder at 1M65 MovementLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 07 Jun 2019From what I know, Generally, SA will be taken out first followed by OA to make up the requested partial withdrawal amt.1 comment1
